page.title: 08SPENNITHORNE-A SCHOOLDAY
page.content:
SOME PUPILS GO ON THE COMPUTER AND SOMETIMES WE HAVE FOOTBALL. AT 3-30PM WE GO HOME. WHEN I GET HOME MY MUM IS AT WORK SO MY SISTER AND I WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL SHE COMES AND THEN I HAVE MY TEA.WE HAVE A COOKED MEAL.THEN I FEED MY ANIMALS.IN THE EVENING I GO OUT TO PLAY. I AM ALLOWED OUT UNTIL 7-30PMTHEN I COME HOME AND WATCH TELEVISION.AT 9-25PM I GO TO BED.SOMETIMES I HAVE THE RADIO ON AND I USUALLY FALL ASLEEP LISTENING TO IT. THEN MY MUM COMES IN AND TURNS IT OFF
BY JONATHAN BARKER AGED 10
